resumeText:
John Doe
Address:  123 Street, Grand Rapids, MI, 48821 
Phone: 123-456-7890
Email: john@example.com

SUMMARY OF SKILLS
● Experienced IT Professional with a Bachelor's degree in IT from Grand Valley State University. 
● Proven expertise in Networking and Software Development. 
● Skilled in troubleshooting system issues and resolving difficult system challenges. 
● Technical proficiency in Windows, Linux, and Network Topologies. 
● Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities. 
● Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 
 
EDUCATION 
Grand Valley State University, Grand Rapids, MI 
Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
IT Consultant 
ABC Company, Grand Rapids, MI 
Apr 2017 – Present 
● Administer network systems and servers. 
● Monitor performance and solve technical problems. 
● Develop and test software applications. 
● Deploy new systems and configure hardware, security systems, and networks. 
● Provide technical support for end-users. 
 
IT Technician 
XYZ Enterprises, Grand Rapids, MI 
Apr 2013 - Mar 2017 
● Installed operating systems and configured system settings. 
● Developed and implemented network security plans. 
● Troubleshoot complex hardware and software issues. 
● Provided remote and in-person technical support. 
● Created and managed user accounts and configured user permissions. 
● Created documentation to facilitate technical support procedures. 
 
CERTIFICATIONS 
Network+ Certification | CompTIA | Dec 2019 
CCNA Certification | Cisco | Oct 2017
